We don’t just edit videos — we optimize them.



We are growing and need someone who can bring structure, clarity, and consistency to post-production across multiple accounts.



If you understand YouTube, value clean systems, and enjoy improving creative workflows — keep reading.



---



| Role Overview



You will coordinate post-production for our video editing team across multiple YouTube clients.



Your responsibility is to:



- Create clear edit guides

- Manage editor timelines and assignment

- Review video drafts for alignment

- Improve clarity and pacing

- Maintain proactive client communication

- Keep production organized and predictable



You are responsible for execution quality and consistency while aligning with the client’s creative vision.



---



| Core Responsibilities



| ???? Edit Guide & Feedback Management



- Create structured edit guides from outlines or briefs

- Translate high-level creative direction into clear editor instructions

- Review drafts and provide timestamped feedback

- Reduce unnecessary revision loops

- Ensure consistency in pacing and clarity



---



| ???? YouTube Optimization Awareness



You must understand:



- The importance of the first 30 seconds

- Viewer retention and pacing

- Clarity over complexity

- Hook strength



You do not need to be a YouTube strategist — but you must recognize weak pacing and unclear storytelling.



---



| ???? Production & Timeline Management



- Track weekly production schedules

- Manage editor capacity across time zones

- Flag issues early (delays, unclear briefs, scope creep)

- Maintain clean version control



---



| ???? Client Communication



- Act as primary async contact for clients

- Clarify feedback before it becomes confusion

- Keep clients updated without them chasing us

- Understand each client’s tone and brand voice



---



| What This Role Is Not



- No filming

- No scriptwriting

- No thumbnail creation



This is a role involving quality control, project management, and clear communication.



---



| Ideal Candidate



- 1–3 years working in YouTube or post-production environments

- Extremely organized

- Clear written communicator

- Proactive rather than reactive

- Understands YouTube pacing and retention fundamentals

- High attention to detail



Bonus:



- Experience managing remote editors

- Familiar with Notion, Slack, 
, Google Docs

- Experience giving timestamped revision notes



---



| Compensation



- $700 USD/month

- Full-time (160 hours/month)

- Remote

- Long-term growth potential



---



| ???? Application Process



We are detail-oriented and expect the same.



To apply:



Start your application with the word **APPLE** in all caps.



Then include:



| 1?? Short Written Response (Max 200 words)



What makes a YouTube video lose retention in the first 60 seconds?



Be specific.



---



| 2?? Work Sample



Attach one example of:



- Revision notes

- An edit guide

- Or producer feedback document



Explain your role briefly.



If you do not have a past example, you can submit a new one based on any of the recent YouTube long form video found on this channel: 



---



| 3?? 3–4 Minute Loom Video



Answer:



- How do you structure revision notes?

- How do you prevent revision chaos?

- How do you handle unclear client feedback?



Keep it concise.



Applications missing any of these items will not be reviewed.



Shortlisted candidates will receive a paid trial task evaluating one of our in-house videos.

title: Scope of Work – Virtual Assistant Naturhjerte
description:
We are looking for a warm, grounded, and detail loving Virtual Assistant to join Naturhjerte on a part time basis, approximately 5 to 7 hours per week, with flexibility for additional hours when needed.



This is a role for someone who feels joy in supporting meaningful work. Someone who values structure, precision, and human connection. Someone who wants to contribute to something real and alive.



Naturhjerte is growing, and the right person will grow with us. This is not simply a task based role. It is an opportunity to become part of a mission that touches people deeply and creates lasting impact.



COMPANY & MISSION – Naturhjerte

Naturhjerte is a Norwegian nature based education company founded on the vision of reconnecting people with the wisdom of the sea, the land, and their own bodies.

Our work focuses especially on helping women rediscover ancestral knowledge around seaweed, wild foods, and natural nourishment, and to rebuild trust in nature and themselves.

We offer online programs, memberships, live teachings, and community spaces centered around seaweed foraging, holistic health, and self sufficiency. Our approach combines science, tradition, and lived experience, always guided by integrity, warmth, and care.

Naturhjerte is not just a business. It is a living ecosystem. A place where knowledge is shared, people are supported, and meaningful change happens.

We value presence, responsibility, kindness, and follow through.





THE POSITION – Virtual Assistant

As Virtual Assistant, you play an essential role in supporting the daily rhythm of Naturhjerte. You help bring structure to creative work. You help ensure that our community feels seen, supported, and guided.

You are reliable. You follow through. You care about the details.

You enjoy creating order. You take ownership. You complete what you start.

You are comfortable working independently, while also being part of a close and supportive collaboration.

You do not wait to be reminded. You see what is needed and take initiative.

You understand that every message, every task, and every interaction contributes to the trust people feel toward Naturhjerte.

Core Responsibilities



Community support inside Kajabi

Answering questions, guiding members, and posting updates



Supporting
 communication and newsletters

Assisting with social media posting and scheduling

Organizing documents, spreadsheets, and participant lists

Providing warm and professional client support

Supporting launches, programs, and live teaching periods

Helping maintain structure in weekly workflows

Supporting operational tasks as needed

Time Commitment

Approximately 5 to 7 hours per week

Additional hours may be needed during launches or active program periods

Fully remote position

Flexible working hours, with availability during European daytime hours preferred

The Ideal Person

Fluent in English, written and spoken

Highly structured and detail oriented

Reliable and consistent

Self motivated and able to work independently

Comfortable learning and using digital tools such as Kajabi, Zoom, Google Drive, Canva, and
 platforms and Monday

Warm and professional in communication

Service minded and caring toward community members

Able to follow instructions carefully and complete tasks fully

Aligned with Naturhjerte’s mission and values

Interest in nature, health, food, sustainability, or community work is a strong advantage

This role is well suited for someone who appreciates meaningful work and wants to contribute to something with depth and purpose.

It is not about doing more. It is about doing what matters, with presence and care.

For the right person, this can become a long term collaboration with growing responsibility and trust.



Naturhjerte is built on relationships. We are looking for someone who wants to grow roots here.

title: Cold Outreach Specialist — AI Terminal App (Waitlist Growth)
description:
ABOUT COSYRA

Cosyra is an AI-powered terminal app that lets developers run real terminal workflows from their phone — SSH, CLI, AI-assisted terminal tasks, and more. We're growing fast and need someone laser-focused on one thing: getting developers to sign up for our waitlist.



This is NOT a community management or social media posting role. This is a proactive outreach role. You will be reaching out directly to people, publications, and creators to get Cosyra in front of as many developers as possible.



YOUR ONE GOAL

Drive as many qualified waitlist signups as possible every single week.



WHAT YOU'LL DO



1. Cold Outreach (60% of your time)

- Send 15-25 personalized outreach messages per day across
, LinkedIn,
/X, and Reddit

-
 AI newsletter owners, tech bloggers, and developer-focused publications to get Cosyra featured or mentioned

- DM AI influencers, developer advocates, YouTube creators, and podcasters with collaboration proposals

- Reach out to developers, DevOps engineers, and AI enthusiasts on LinkedIn with personalized messages

- Engage authentically on Reddit, Hacker News, and developer forums where Cosyra solves a real problem

- Follow up systematically — most replies come on the 2nd or 3rd follow-up



2. Paid Advertising Research (20% of your time)

- Research and identify paid sponsorship opportunities in AI/tech newsletters (e.g., TLDR, ByteByteGo, etc.)

- Find developer communities, 
 servers, and forums that offer paid promotions or pinned posts

- Source podcast and YouTube sponsorship opportunities with creators in the AI/dev tools space

- Present a weekly summary of paid opportunities with pricing, audience size, and your recommendation

- Coordinate and manage bookings for approved paid placements



3. Tracking & Reporting (20% of your time)

- Maintain a clean, organized outreach tracker in Google Sheets (who you contacted, channel, response, result)

- Provide a weekly report: outreach sent, responses received, waitlist signups generated, paid opportunities found

- Track which messaging angles and channels are producing the best results

- Continuously test and improve your outreach based on data



WHAT WE EXPECT

- Consistent daily output — this role requires discipline and follow-through

- Respect all platform rules — no spam, no mass blasting, no automation bots

- Creative problem-solving — find new channels and angles to get Cosyra in front of developers

- Honest, transparent reporting — we care about real numbers, not vanity metrics



NON-NEGOTIABLE RULES

- NO mass DM blasting or automated scraping tools

- NO spammy outreach — every message must be personalized and genuine

- You must follow platform rules strictly to avoid getting accounts flagged or banned

- If an approach isn't working, tell us — don't just keep doing the same thing



REQUIREMENTS

- Proven experience in cold outreach, lead generation, or business development

- Excellent written English — your messages need to sound natural, conversational, and not templated

- Comfortable using
, LinkedIn,
/X, and Reddit daily for outreach

- Highly organized with strong attention to detail for tracking and follow-ups

- Self-starter who can work independently and hit weekly targets without constant supervision

- Familiarity with researching paid advertising and sponsorship opportunities



NICE TO HAVE

- Experience with outreach tools (
, Apollo, Lemlist, LinkedIn Sales Navigator)

- Understanding of developer communities and what resonates with technical audiences

- Previous experience growing a waitlist or doing launch outreach for a SaaS/tech product

- Knowledge of AI tools like Claude, ChatGPT, Cursor, Replit, etc.

- Experience evaluating and booking newsletter or podcast sponsorships



TOOLS YOU'LL USE

- Google Sheets (Required — for tracking all outreach)

- LinkedIn (Required)

-
/X and Reddit (Required)

-
 (Gmail or similar)

- Optional: 
, Apollo, Lemlist, or similar outreach tools



COMPENSATION

$400/month for 20 hours/week (approximately $5/hour). Performance bonuses available based on waitlist signup milestones — the more signups you drive, the more you earn.



HOW TO APPLY

Please include the following in your application:

1. A brief summary of your cold outreach or lead generation experience (who did you reach out to, what channels, what results?)

2. Write a sample outreach DM (2-3 sentences) you would send to an AI YouTuber asking them to feature Cosyra

3. Your weekly availability and preferred working hours

title: Commercial Real Estate Acquisitions Analyst (Remote)
description:
About Castle Hill Investments



Castle Hill Investments acquires commercial real estate through online auctions. We provide liquidity in an inefficient market where some sellers need to dispose of property quickly. The barriers (cash required, 30-day close, limited info, no contingencies) keep most buyers away — that's our edge.



We're looking for a deal hunter, not a button-pusher.



About the Role



This is not a typical underwriting position. We don't need someone to passively monitor auction sites and hand us spreadsheets. We need someone who will hunt for deals, form opinions, and pitch them to us — the way a scout would bring opportunities to an investor.



You'll be the first set of eyes on every potential acquisition. Your job is to find the deals worth our attention, explain why they're interesting, and flag the risks. You'll participate in regular video calls with our leadership team where you present deals and debate strategy. 



To be clear: you won't be originating deals — 100% of deal flow comes from published auction listings on sites like Ten-X, Crexi, and RIMarketplace. Your job is to evaluate what's out there, identify the opportunities worth pursuing, and pitch them to leadership.



If you're waiting to be told what to do, this isn't for you. If you want to be in the room where decisions happen, keep reading.



What You'll Do:

-Hunt daily: Monitor Ten-X/LoopNet, Crexi, and RIMarketplace for deals in our target range ($500K–$2M)

-Form opinions: Don't just flag deals — tell us why you like them. "This looks like a value-add play because..." or "I'd pass on this because..."

-Pitch on calls: 3-5x/week video calls where you present new deals, share deeper analysis on yesterday's MAYBEs, and discuss next steps

-Build conviction: When you find a deal you believe in, make the case. Push back if we're skeptical. We want your perspective.

-Build strategy: You’ll develop how this new business operates alongside leadership.

-Develop into leadership: This role has a clear path to becoming our Head of Acquisitions as the business scales



Who You Are:

-Entrepreneurial mindset — You see deals the way an investor does, not the way an employee does

-Opinionated and confident — You'll tell us what you think, not just what we want to hear

-Strong communicator — You can explain a deal clearly on a video call and in writing

-Commercially aware — You understand what makes a property attractive (location, cash flow potential, value-add angles) even with limited information

-Self-directed — You'll figure out what needs to happen without waiting for instructions



Requirements:

-Experience in commercial real estate — underwriting, brokerage, acquisitions, or similar

-Excellent spoken and written English (you'll be pitching on video calls)

-Comfortable with ambiguity and incomplete information

-Available for Mon/Wed/Fri morning calls (~10-11am CST)

-Full-time availability (40 hrs/week), M-F 10am–7pm CST



Compensation:

-Base: $1,300–$1,600/month USD (based on experience and interview performance)

-Performance bonus: Deal identification bonuses when your recommendations convert to acquisitions

-13th month pay, PH holidays, PTO



How to Apply

Send an
 to 
 with:

1. Your resume

2. A 2-minute video introducing yourself. Tell us:

a. Why you want this role (specifically, not generically)

b. A deal or investment you recommended to someone in the past — what was it, why did you like it, what happened?



We're not looking for polish. We're looking for someone who thinks like an investor.

title: Capacity Planner
description:
Join the Aventus Team!

We are Aventus — a boutique customer experience BPO based in Charleston, South Carolina, with over a decade of delivering exceptional omnichannel support to 100+ valued clients and partners in the e-commerce space.



Check out our website: 



We’re looking for a detail-oriented and analytical Capacity Planner to support our workforce strategy and ensure staffing plans align with forecasted demand across client programs. This role plays a key part in maintaining service levels, optimizing resource utilization, and supporting operational decision-making through accurate forecasting, scheduling insights, and performance analysis. If you enjoy working with data, anticipating business needs, and turning numbers into actionable plans, this is a great opportunity to make a meaningful impact within a fast-paced, remote-first environment.



What You’ll Be Doing

As a Capacity Planner, you will own the full workforce management cycle: forecasting demand, translating it into staffing and schedules, and then managing the day in real time to protect service levels and labor efficiency. Your role goes beyond “making schedules”; it includes demand forecasting, resource scheduling, time management, day-of queue management, time-off handling, and scenario planning.



Your Core Responsibilities

**Forecasting and Capacity Planning

- Build short-term and long-range forecasts (typically interval-based) for workload/volume and handle time, then translate forecasts into headcount and capacity requirements.

- Maintain forecast inputs that materially affect staffing: AHT trends, shrinkage assumptions (planned and unplanned), occupancy targets, and seasonality/event effects.

- Track forecast vs actual, quantify forecast accuracy, and perform root-cause analysis when service outcomes miss targets.

- Partner with Operations and cross-functional teams to incorporate “external factors” into forecasts (promos, outages, policy changes, new launches, routing changes).



**Staffing Models and Scheduling

- Convert demand into staffing requirements using contact center staffing principles/models (for example, Erlang-based approaches are commonly used to connect volume, handle time, response time, and required staffing).

- Generate schedules that align tea
mber coverage to demand, including work rules, shift types, training/offline activities, and time-off approvals aligned to staffing impact.

- Maintain clean headcount rosters and schedule inputs (skills, queues, sites, credentials) to keep forecasts and schedules reliable.

- Create multiple staffing scenarios when inputs change (hiring delays, attrition, shrinkage shifts, new SLAs), and communicate tradeoffs and risks clearly.



**Intraday Management and Real-Time Control

- Monitor the current day’s volumes and trends, then adjust schedules accordingly (OT, VTO, skill rebalances, moving offline work, rescheduling shrinkage events).

- Actively manage schedule adherence using real-time adherence concepts (scheduled activity vs actual activity) and coordinate with Ops to correct deviations that threaten SLAs.

- Own an escalation plan and decision thresholds for intraday actions (what triggers action, what actions are allowed, how changes are communicated).



**Reporting, Analytics, and Decision Support

- Produce daily/weekly/monthly performance reporting that ties forecast, coverage, adherence, and service results together for leaders.

- Build and improve reporting templates and dashboards that make trends and risk visible (forecast vs actual, interval performance, attendance/tardiness, overtime drivers).



**Stakeholder Partnership and Planning Culture

- Run regular and ad hoc reviews with Operations and other stakeholders to review staffing models, risks, and mitigation plans.

- Balance business needs with the reality that schedules affect humans (practical, sustainable scheduling and communication).



What You’ll Bring to the Table

- Proven experience in workforce management and capacity planning within a BPO, e-commerce, or service-driven environment.

- Strong working knowledge of forecasting methodologies, scheduling principles, and intraday management.

- Proficiency in WFM tools (e.g., Verint, Aspect, or similar) and advanced Excel or Google Sheets skills.

- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to interpret complex data sets.

- Clear and effective communication skills, with the ability to collaborate cross-functionally.

- Ability to manage multiple priorities, meet tight deadlines, and stay composed in fast-paced, real-time environments.

- Reliable high-speed internet connection and a dependable computer setup for remote work



Your Core Competencies

- Analytical Thinking: Uses data-driven insights to forecast demand, identify risks, and support workforce decisions.

- Planning & Organization: Translates complex demand signals into structured staffing plans and executable schedules.

- Operational Judgment: Makes sound, timely decisions during intraday fluctuations and SLA risk scenarios.

- Attention to Detail: Ensures forecasts, schedules, rosters, and reports are accurate and reliable.

- Proactivity: Anticipates capacity gaps and acts early to mitigate service and staffing risks.

- Adaptability: Adjusts forecasts and plans quickly in response to changing volumes, priorities, or business needs.

- Communication: Clearly explains workforce insights, tradeoffs, and recommendations to Operations and stakeholders.

- Calm Under Pressure: Maintains focus and decision-making discipline during peak volume periods and real-time escalations.

- Accountability: Takes ownership of workforce outcomes and follows through on commitments.



What’s In It For You?

- 100% Remote Work – Work from anywhere in the Philippines

- Leadership Growth – Opportunity to scale your impact and grow within Workforce Operations

- Competitive Pay – $9/hr + benefits as an independent contractor

- Supportive Culture – Collaborate with an experienced and empowering leadership team

- Meaningful Work – Help drive performance outcomes and ensure team success

- Long-Term Stability – Join a growing company that values your career path



Ready to Plan with Precision?

If you’re passionate about forecasting, data-driven decision-making, and turning insights into smart staffing strategies, we’d love to meet you!

title: VIDEO EDITOR (SHORT FORM)
description:
Video Editor (Short-Form Content)



15 Hours per Week | $10 AUD per Hour | Growth Opportunity

Must Work PH Time 9AM–5PM



Lift The Label is an Australian gym & streetwear brand looking for a performance-focused short-form video editor to join our growing team.



This role focuses on editing high-performing short-form content for:

- Meta Ads 

- TikTok Ads

- Instagram Reels

- TikTok Organic

- YouTube Shorts



We film in-house and provide raw footage + UGC. Your role is to turn that into scroll-stopping content.



What You’ll Be Doing

- Editing 8–12 short-form videos per week

- Cutting raw footage into engaging, fast-paced edits

- Creating strong hooks in the first 1–3 seconds

- Adding auto-captions and styling them cleanly

- Adding text overlays and performance-focused callouts

- Cutting and editing UGC clips

- Ensuring videos are optimised for paid performance (retention focused)

-  Delivering content on schedule



Requirements

- Strong experience with CapCut (non-negotiable)

- Proven experience editing short-form performance content

- Understand hook rate, retention, and scroll behaviour

- Comfortable editing for paid ads (not just aesthetic edits)

- Strong attention to detail

- Reliable internet and consistent availability

- Must work during PH 9AM–5PM



What We’re Looking For

This is not just a creative role — it’s a performance role.



You must understand:

- How to grab attention immediately

- How to structure short-form for retention

- How to avoid slow intros

- How to cut dead space

- How to make videos feel dynamic



We are looking for someone who understands short-form trends but can also follow brand direction.



Growth Opportunities

Potential increase in hours based on performance

Opportunity to grow into a senior editor role

Involvement in creative testing for paid ads

Long-term position with consistent weekly work



Pay & Structure

$10 AUD per hour

15 hours per week

Consistent weekly workload

Paid weekly via invoice



To Apply



Please send:

Portfolio of short-form work (paid ads preferred)

A short Loom explaining how you approach hook creation

Confirmation you can work PH 9AM–5PM

title: Sales & Marketing Specialist
description:
Core Responsibilities:

We are seeking a highly driven sales-focused professional with native-level English fluency to lead client acquisition for our property management services. This role’s primary focus is sales — turning prospects into signed clients. You will be the front line of communication with property owners, identifying their needs, presenting our services, and closing deals.



The ideal candidate is a natural-born closer — confident, persuasive, and strategic — who thrives on results. While marketing and outreach will support your efforts, your main responsibility is to generate new business through direct outreach, online interaction, and effective relationship-building with property owners throughout Philadelphia.



Key Responsibilities:

Aggressive Client Acquisition & Conversion: Utilize strong sales acumen and communication skills to successfully convert inquiries into active property management clients, primarily through phone calls and direct engagement.



Strategic Lead Generation: Develop and execute targeted marketing and outreach strategies specifically designed to generate new, qualified leads (property owners) in the Philadelphia market.



Targeted Digital Outreach: Actively manage and promote services across key social platforms 
, Instagram, TikTok) and engage directly within local Philadelphia owner groups to identify and connect with potential clients.



Performance & Sales Reporting: Rigorously track performance metrics, focusing on lead quality, conversion rates, and overall client acquisition success.



Market Expertise: Develop a deep understanding of Philadelphia's neighborhoods and the competitive property management landscape to tailor effective sales pitches and offers.



Ideal Candidate Profile Highlights:

Proven track record in high-stakes sales and negotiation.



Exceptional verbal communication and interpersonal skills.



Ability to sell both the company's services and their own value proposition persuasively.

title: Customer Service Representative (CSR)
description:
We’re looking for a professional, friendly, and articulate Customer Service Representative (CSR) to join our remote team! If you have excellent communication skills, a positive attitude, and thrive in a fast-paced environment, we’d love to hear from you.



As a CSR, you’ll be the first point of contact for customers, handling inbound calls and inquiries. You’ll follow specific client instructions to assist with scheduling, payments, messages, and more, always ensuring every interaction leaves a great impression.



What You’ll Need



- Fluent English (verbal & written) — clear, confident communication is essential



- Dual monitors for efficient multitasking



- Reliable, hardwired internet connection (must be directly connected to your modem)



- Quiet workspace free of background noise



Please include the following with your application:



1. A video recording introducing yourself, starting with:

“Hi Contact Automation, my name is [Your Name]...”

Then share three interesting facts about yourself outside of work.



2. A photo or short video showing your home office setup (workspace, equipment, etc.).



Requirements:

- Open availability, including Saturdays and Sundays

- Previous phone-based customer service or answering service experience

- Strong attention to detail and organizational skills

- Ability to multi-task in a fast-paced environment (phone +
)

- Positive, professional, and customer-focused attitude

- Comfortable working independently with minimal supervision



Why You’ll Love Working With Us!



You’ll join a supportive team that values clear communication, teamwork, and consistent performance. Every day brings new challenges and the chance to make a positive impact with every call. Your computer skills, problem-solving ability, and upbeat personality will help us meet and exceed our goals together!

title: Mobile App Dev Team (React Native) – Finish MVP & App Store Launch
description:
### **Project Overview**



We have an **existing mobile application codebase** that is partially implemented. We are seeking an **experienced engineering team** to take over the repository, complete remaining work, and deliver a **production-ready MVP**.



This is a **takeover and finish** engagement. Not greenfield.



No product vision, business model, or proprietary logic will be shared publicly. Full context is provided only during interviews and under NDA.



---



### **What We Are Looking For**



- A **small, established engineering team (2–4 people)**

- One designated **technical lead** responsible for delivery and communication

- Proven experience shipping **mobile apps to the Apple App Store and Google Play Store**

- Ability to work cleanly within an existing codebase

- Clear written communication and ownership



Solo developers will not be considered unless operating under a structured delivery framework.



---



### **Tech Context (High-Level Only)**



- Cross-platform mobile app (React Native / Expo or equivalent)

- Backend and payments already partially integrated

- Hosted infrastructure already in place



Detailed architecture is shared only after initial qualification.



---



### **Scope of Work**



- Review existing repository

- Identify and complete remaining MVP gaps

- Stabilize builds

- Prepare production releases

- Deploy the app under client-owned accounts



---



### **MVP Acceptance (Non-Negotiable)**



The MVP is considered **complete and accepted only when**:



- The app is **approved and publicly downloadable** from the **Apple App Store (iOS)**

- The app is **approved and publicly downloadable** from the **Google Play Store (Android)**

- The app runs on real devices with **no developer tools or setup required**

- All source code, credentials, deployments, and accounts are fully transferred to the client



Anything short of this does **not** qualify as delivery.



---



### **Engagement & Payment Structure**



- Fixed-fee engagement

- Short **takeover audit** before full engagement

- Milestone check-ins

- Final payment released **only after MVP acceptance**



Clear agreement required before work begins.



---



### **Evaluation Process**



Shortlisted teams will be asked to:



- Review the repository

- Provide a written plan to reach MVP acceptance

- Confirm timeline and responsibilities



This is used to confirm **fit and competence**



---



### **How to Apply**



Please include:



- Examples of mobile apps your team has shipped to app stores

- Team structure and roles

- Confirmation that you understand and accept the MVP acceptance criteria



---

title: Senior Google Ads (PPC) Strategist – Dietary Supplement & Health Brands
description:
ABOUT US



Nutra Marketers (
) is a specialized marketing agency working exclusively with dietary supplement and health brands.



We help direct-to-consumer (DTC) supplement companies scale profitably using Google Ads, Google Shopping, and AI-driven performance strategies that are compliant with Google’s policies for regulated health products.



- We do not work in multiple niches. Supplements and health brands are our only focus.



THE ROLE (READ THIS CAREFULLY)



- This is NOT a junior role and NOT a task-based execution job.

- We are not PPC experts — and that’s intentional. 

- We want someone who knows more than we do, can lead PPC strategy, and can tell us what to do, not wait for instructions.

- This role combines strategist + executor.



You will:



- Design PPC strategies

- Build campaigns from scratch

- Optimize performance daily

- Monitor compliance in a restricted niche

- Explain why decisions are made

- Improve results continuously



CORE RESPONSIBILITIES - Client Google Ads Campaigns (DTC Supplements). 



You will fully own Google Ads performance for supplement and health brands, including:



- Building Google Ads accounts from scratch

- Designing account structures for:

     - Search campaigns

     - Google Shopping 

     - AI and Performance Max

- Keyword research specific to dietary supplements & health products

- Writing compliant, high-converting ad copy

- Conversion tracking setup & validation:

     - Google Ads conversions

     - GA4

     - Google Tag Manager

- Bid strategy management:

     - Manual bidding (when appropriate)

     - Max Conversions

     - Target CPA

     - Target ROAS

- Ongoing optimization:

     - Search term analysis

     - Negative keyword strategy

     - Ad creative testing

     - Landing page feedback & CRO insights

- Monitoring spend efficiency, CPA, ROAS, and conversion quality

- Ensuring policy compliance in a restricted niche



GOOGLE AI & AUTOMATION EXPERTISE - You must have a strong working understanding of Google’s AI-driven ad systems and how to use them strategically, not blindly.



This includes:



Performance Max:

- Structuring PMax campaigns correctly

     - Using audience signals effectively

     - Understanding asset group optimization

     - Knowing when PMax is appropriate vs when it is not

- AI-Driven Bidding & Optimization:

     - Max Conversions

     - Target CPA / ROAS

     - Knowing how data volume impacts AI performance

- Creative & Asset Automation:

     - Feeding Google high-quality signals

     - Controlling creative outputs to avoid waste

- Ability to explain:

     - How Google’s AI makes decisions

     - When to trust automation

     - When to override or constrain it



We are looking for someone who can leverage Google’s AI intelligently, not someone who simply “turns it on and hopes for the best.”



INTERNAL NUTRA MARKETERS PPC (B2B LEAD GENERATION) - You will also manage Nutra Marketers’ own Google Ads account, focused on B2B lead generation.



Example keywords our cleints search include:



“supplement marketing agency”

“PPC for supplements”

“dietary supplement advertising”

“Google Ads for supplement brands”



Responsibilities include:



- Building and optimizing B2B search campaigns

- Lead quality optimization (not just volume)

- Conversion tracking for:

     - Form fills

     - Booked calls

- Cost-per-lead optimization

- Ongoing testing and refinement of messaging

- Reporting on performance and pipeline impact



STRATEGY, OWNERSHIP & LEADERSHIP - You will not be micromanaged.



You are expected to:



- Develop PPC strategies independently

- Identify problems and opportunities proactively

- Justify decisions using data

- Recommend changes without being asked

- Explain strategy and performance clearly to non-experts

- Continuously improve efficiency and results



REPORTING AND COMMUNICATION



- Clear weekly and monthly reporting

- Performance insights (what’s working, what’s not, and why)

- Action plans for optimization

- communication with leadership



PAID TEST PROJECT (FINAL APPLICANTS) - Final candidates will complete a paid test project:



- Audit:

     - One client account

     - One Nutra Marketers account

- Identify:

     - What is working

     - What is not

     - Missed opportunities

- Provide:

     - A clear optimization roadmap

     - Strategy explanations

     - Expected impact



This is a real-world evaluation of strategic thinking and execution ability.



COMPENSATION & BENEFITS



- Part-time to start

- Opportunity to move to full-time

- Competitive pay based on experience

- Paid holidays

- Health benefits

- 13th month pay

- Long-term growth opportunity

- High autonomy and trust



HOW TO APPLY - Please include:



1. Brief introduction

2. Your hourly rate

3. Years of Google Ads experience

4. Types of accounts managed

5. Experience with Performance Max & AI-driven bidding

6. Any supplement or health experience

7. Example results (CPA, ROAS, scale achieved)



Thank you for your time and consideration. 



Jacob

title: VA & Appointment Setter - FULL TIME** - HVAC Industry
description:
Position Title: Virtual Assistant & Cold Caller – HVAC Industry

Company: Reliance Home Comfort



About the Company:



Reliance Home Comfort is a leading Canadian home services provider specializing in HVAC systems, water heaters, plumbing services, and protection plans. With over 60 years of industry experience and thousands of employees across Canada and the United States, Reliance is recognized for delivering reliable, high-quality home comfort solutions.



Compensation:



Base Salary: $800 CAD per month

Payment Schedule: Bi-weekly (every other Thursday)

Currency: Canadian Dollars (CAD)



Working Hours:



Full Time Position** 

Schedule: Monday to Saturday 

Hours: 10:00 AM – 6:00 PM EST



Break Policy:



Two (2) 15-minute breaks per shift

Breaks must be announced in the group chat prior to commencement



Time Off & Holidays:



Time-off requests must be submitted at least 24 hours in advance



Role Requirements & Expectations:



Minimum Bachelor's degree preferred

Minimum 5 years experience in similar roles

One-month probationary period for new candidates 

Progress and performance metrics are actively monitored and recorded (candidates will be evaluated weekly on results) 

Consistent achievement of performance targets is expected

Full transparency, honesty, and professional communication required

Ability to work independently and manage time effectively

80 to 100 Cold Calls a Day Minimum 



Employment Policy:



Strict zero-tolerance policy regarding simultaneous full-time employment during scheduled working hours; violations will result in immediate termination. 



Technical Requirements:



Windows-based PC

Multi-monitor setup

Reliable primary internet connection with backup Wi-Fi (Fibre Optic connection is preferred) 

Backup power supply

Equipment capable of maintaining uninterrupted performance during extreme weather conditions

Strong knowledge of CRM systems and Intermediate computer proficiency



Experience Requirements:



Proven experience in sales and/or cold calling

Ability to work the full scheduled shift (Monday–Saturday, 10:00 AM – 6:00 PM EST); all activity is tracked



Ideal Candidate:



We are seeking motivated, results-driven professionals who are committed to growth, consistency, and delivering measurable outcomes. Candidates should be comfortable navigating CRM platforms, managing digital systems efficiently, and leveraging technology to optimize performance. If you are prepared to perform at a high level and contribute to a performance-oriented team, we encourage you to apply.

title: Appointment Setter (High Volumn)
description:
We are looking for a highly disciplined and hardworking Appointment Setter to join our growing education consultancy team.

This is a high-volume outbound calling role. We are expecting you to make at least 20 calls per hour. If you are not comfortable making large volume of calls daily, this role is not for you. We are not looking for “talent”. We are looking for hardworking, consistency, discipline, and commitment.



Your Role

• Call 160+ warm leads daily (8 hours shift)

• Follow structured call scripts

• Book at least 10 qualified appointments for Senior Consultants daily

• Maintain accurate call records

• Handle objections calmly and professionally

• Follow up consistently until contact is made



This is a performance-based role. Only committed individuals should apply. 



We Are Looking For Someone Who:

• Speaks clear, neutral English (minimal accent)

• Has strong phone confidence

• Is mentally strong and not easily discouraged

• Is comfortable with repetitive work

• Is available full-time

• Wants long-term growth

If you are job-hopping or looking for temporary income, this role is not suitable.



What We Offer

• Stable long-term opportunity

• A minimum of 20 hours and maximum of 40 hours per week

• Salary reviews Every quarterly 

• Growth opportunity into Consultant role (for top performers)



Application Process (Important)

Due to high application volume, we only review candidates who complete the following:

 1. Record a 1-minute self-introduction video in English.

 2. Record a 30-second cold call simulation using any pretend script



Send your video link together with your CV. Applications without video submission will NOT be reviewed.

title: Research & Culture-Aware YouTube Script Writer (Part-Time)
description:
| About Unlimited Video Editing (UVE)



Unlimited Video Editing works with YouTube creators to produce engaging, performance-driven content.



Some projects require deep factual breakdowns.



Others require cultural analysis, commentary, and emotionally intelligent storytelling.



We’re hiring a script writer who can think — not just summarize.



This is part-time, per-script work with growing consistency.



---



| What This Role Actually Is



You will write YouTube scripts across a range of topics, including:



- Deep research breakdowns

- Cultural commentary

- Behavioral science analysis

- Personal development frameworks

- Business and tech analysis

- Internet trends

- Pop culture commentary



This is not academic writing.



This is not blog writing.



This is not AI-regurgitated summaries.



We need clarity, structure, engagement, independent thinking, and strong audience awareness.



---



| Example Topics You Might Write About



- “Here’s Why You Need to Think Offline More”

    

    (Neuroscience + behavioral science + algorithm culture analysis)

    

- “What Really Happens If You Sleep 6 Hours Every Night”

- “First Look at Lil Yachty’s New Concrete Boys – Let’s Talk About It”

- “Bronny James Reveals His New Signature Logo”



Some topics require:



- Data and research

- Cultural awareness

- Opinion and framing

- Emotional nuance



You must be comfortable with all of it.



---



| Responsibilities



Research & Depth



- Go beyond surface summaries

- Cross-reference sources

- Understand underlying mechanics

- Break down complex ideas clearly



---



| Cultural Awareness



You must actively consume Western internet culture and understand:



- YouTube storytelling rhythm

- Internet tone and 
 timing

- Modern discourse cycles

- Trending conversations

- Cultural context



You should naturally stay up-to-date with:



- Business and tech trends

- Social commentary

- Music / pop culture shifts

- Internet discourse



---



| Script Structure & Pacing



- Write strong hooks

- Structure arguments logically

- Maintain narrative flow

- Blend insight + clarity

- Avoid rambling or over-intellectualizing



---



| Visual Thinking



- Suggest where visuals help explain ideas

- Guide editors with structure

- Identify 
nts for pattern interrupts



---



| Ideal Candidate



- Strong written English (REQUIRED)

- Clear, structured thinker

- Naturally curious

- Actively watches YouTube

- Follows western internet and cultural trends

- Comfortable blending research + opinion

- Can simplify without oversimplifying

- Open to feedback



Bonus:



- Background in behavioral science, business, tech, or culture analysis

- Previous YouTube scripting experience



---



| Compensation



- $5USD/hour

- Paid per script (hours tracked per project)

- Part-time

- Growing consistency over time

- Long-term relationship preferred ? This role will lead to full-time



We care more about quality and clarity than speed.



---



| Application Process



Start your application with the word **ORANGE** in all caps. Your application will be disregarded without this.



Submit the following:



---



|  Writing Sample



Attach a YouTube-style script you have written before - long-form preferred.



If you do not have one, write a 500-word intro for:



“What Really Happens If You Sleep 6 Hours Every Night”



Blend:



- Science

- Cultural commentary

- Clear hook

- Structured thinking



---



Shortlisted candidates will receive a small paid test assignment.



Applications missing the keyword ORANGE will not be reviewed.

title: Social Media Manager (SMM) – AI News & Short-Form Content Execution Focus
description:
Social Media Manager (SMM) – AI News & Short-Form Content Execution Focus

Type: Full-time

Location: Remote / WFH



OVERVIEW:

We’re looking for a Social Media Manager to run and grow AI-themed social media pages focused on trending artificial intelligence news, tools, and updates.



This role is execution-focused. You will monitor AI news sources, tech publications, hashtags, and competing AI theme pages daily. Your job is to identify high-performing or trending topics, verify information using original sources, and transform those topics into optimized short-form content using AI tools and strong visual design.



You must be highly organized, fast-moving, and comfortable using ChatGPT and other AI tools to restructure and improve content—not just copy it. Strong Canva and CapCut skills are non-negotiable.



KEY RESPONSIBILITIES:

- Monitor AI news daily (e.g., major tech publications such as  TechCrunch, official company blogs, product launch announcements, etc.)

- Track trending AI hashtags, viral posts, and competing AI theme pages across TikTok, Instagram, YouTube, and X

- Identify high-performing topics early and turn them into optimized content quickly

- Verify claims using original sources before publishing

- Use ChatGPT and other AI tools to:

- Check accuracy of trending posts

- Improve hooks and structure

- Generate carousel outlines (e.g., 8–10 slides)

- Refine captions for engagement

- Create branded carousel posts using Canva

- Edit short-form videos using CapCut for TikTok, Reels, and Shorts

- Repurpose content across platforms while maintaining consistent branding

- Maintain a consistent daily posting schedule

- Track basic analytics (views, saves, shares, watch time) and identify patterns

- Continuously improve formatting, hooks, and storytelling to increase engagement



REQUIREMENTS:

- Advanced Canva and CapCut skills (must be clear in portfolio)

- Strong understanding of short-form content structure (hooks, pacing, retention)

- Ability to monitor multiple AI news sources and theme pages daily

- Ability to quickly summarize and simplify tech/AI news

- Strong ChatGPT prompting skills (editing, restructuring, improving clarity and engagement)

- Ability to fact-check information using primary sources

- Fast turnaround time and ability to produce content consistently

- Organized workflow and ability to follow brand guidelines

- Strong English writing skills



TO APPLY, YOU MUST-HAVE THE FOLLOWING APPLICATION ITEMS:

1. Portfolio demonstrating social media pages, branded content, carousel posts, and short-form videos (link or file)

2. Latest resume

3. Required for this role:

- Submit 1 sample AI carousel (8–10 slides) based on a recent AI news story >> send the link along with your portfolio & resume

- Include the original source link

- Briefly explain how you optimized the content for engagement



!! Applications without a portfolio and sample content will not be considered. !!

title: Real Estate Transaction Coordinator and Virtual Assistant
description:
The Longleaf Group is a growing, systems-driven real estate team serving clients in North and South Carolina. We focus on delivering a high-level client experience through organization, clear communication, and strong internal processes.



We are looking for a full-time Transaction Coordinator & Operations Assistant who wants to grow long-term with a structured, performance-focused team.



If you enjoy:

1)  A structured environment and being a big part of creating structure, processes, and SOPs along the way.

2)  The Transaction Management Process and being a part of every step of the process working directly with all stakeholders.

3)  Handling the details and keeping other on track and making sure no opportunities are missed.

4)  Enjoy learning and able to work independently and also being treated as a valuable part of the team.



...This could be the perfect role for you...

----



What You’ll Be Responsible For



Transaction Management



You will help manage real estate transactions from contract to closing, ensuring everything stays organized and on track.



Responsibilities include:

	•	Coordinating with lenders, attorneys, inspectors, vendors, and agents

	•	Scheduling inspections and key milestones

	•	Tracking deadlines (earnest money, due diligence, contingencies, closing)

	•	Managing compliance documentation

	•	Sending transaction updates and communications

	•	Ensuring files are complete and accurate



Nice to have: experience using SkySlope or similar transaction management tools.





CRM & Lead Management



We use Follow Up Boss as our CRM system.



You will:

	•	Keep CRM data clean and organized

	•	Monitor lead lists and ensure no opportunities are missed

	•	Confirm contact information and update lead statuses

	•	Support outbound confirmations with vendors and selected leads

	•	Help track birthdays and important client milestones

	•	Assign follow-up tasks when agent outreach is needed



Nice to have: experience using Follow Up Boss or a similar CRM.



--



Administrative & Operations Support

	•	Organize files in Google Drive

	•	Maintain templates and checklists

	•	Support process documentation and SOP creation

	•	Assist with updating Google Business Profile

	•	Help request reviews after closing

	•	Use tools like Google Docs, Sheets, Meet, Gemini, and ChatGPT appropriately



---



What We’re Looking For

        •	Willingness to learn and take on new challenges

	•	Experience in real estate transaction coordination (U.S. market preferred)

	•	Highly organized and deadline-driven

	•	Strong written and verbal English communication skills

	•	Comfortable making outbound confirmation calls

	•	Process-oriented and detail-focused

	•	Passionate about learning and improving

	•	A true team player who communicates clearly and takes ownership



Must have reliable internet and the ability to work full-time.





Nice to Have

	•	Experience with SkySlope, DotLoop or other Transaction Tools

        •	Experience contract to close processes

	•	Experience with Follow Up Boss

	•	Experience supporting high-producing agents

	•	Familiarity with automation tools

         •	Experience with Notion, Loom, and Slack

 ----



What We Offer

	•	Full-time, stable remote position

	•	Competitive compensation based on experience

	•	Bonus potential based on individual and company performance

	•	Opportunity to grow in a team environment





Interested?  Awesome!  Next Steps.



**Please apply using at least 6 apply points or more.

**In the title of your response include todays date and title  "The Longleaf Group Team 2026"



We would like to hear about your interest in this position.  Share any examples of previous experience in a similar role.  What do you hope to find in your next role?  Anything interesting you would like to share?   



We look forward to hearing from you!

title: Virtual Assistant, Sales Enablement (BDR / Digital Marketing Assistant)
description:
The primary responsibilities include list building, research, client and decision-maker avatar identification, and efficiently organizing tasks. You will be managing initial outreach via LinkedIn and e-mail to prospective clients. Additional duties include digital marketing assistant, graphic design, lead generation campaigns, LinkedIn engagement, setting appointments, and collaborating with the team to develop effective systems and processes are also crucial aspects of this role. We value initiative and creativity in finding innovative ways to engage with potential leads. 



RESPONSIBILITIES 

• Collaborate with the recruitment team to understand ideal client and candidate profiles (avatars). 

• Conduct market research and mapping to identify potential clients in our niche. 

• Create campaign message sequencing and establish campaign automation. 

• Conduct targeted outreach on LinkedIn to potential clients. 

• Build and maintain comprehensive lists of qualified prospects within our niche. 

• Identify and assess prospects to ensure they fit the desired avatar criteria. 

• Utilize LinkedIn, Sales Navigator,
, and other communication platforms to initiate contact with prospects. • Work with the team to develop and refine outreach strategies to increase response rates. 

• Analyze and report on the effectiveness of outreach efforts, suggesting improvements. 

• Coordinate with the team to schedule appointments and manage calendars effectively. 

• Provide regular progress reports and updates on lead generation activities. 

• Maintain accurate records of all communication and interactions with prospects. 

• Collaborate with the team to develop and optimize systems and processes for lead generation. 

• Stay up-to-date with industry trends and best practices to enhance outreach efforts.

title: Real Estate Virtual Assistant - Seller Lead Specialist
description:
Company Overview

KVR Legacy LLC is a real estate investment company focused on helping distressed homeowners find

fast, professional solutions. We specialize in pre-foreclosure, foreclosure, tax delinquent, and motivated

seller situations.



Position Summary

The Real Estate Virtual Assistant (VA) will manage inbound and outbound seller calls, qualify leads

using our structured call flow, evaluate motivation using the 5 Cs framework, document all activity in our

CRM, and schedule qualified appointments for acquisitions.



Core Responsibilities

• Handle inbound and outbound seller calls professionally.

• Follow structured call scripts and qualify distressed homeowners.

• Evaluate leads using the 5 Cs: Condition, Circumstance, Commitment, Communication, Capacity.

• Collect property details including mortgage balance, liens, payments, timeline, and reason for

selling.

• Accurately document notes and update CRM daily.

• Tag and categorize leads (Hot, Warm, Cold, Dead).

• Schedule and confirm qualified seller appointments.

• Complete all follow-ups without fail.



Ideal Candidate Profile

• Confident and comfortable on the phone.

• Experienced in real estate wholesaling or investing (preferred).

• Strong rapport-building and objection handling skills.

• Highly organized and detail-oriented.

• Coachable and KPI-driven.

• Self-motivated with a strong work ethic.



KPIs & Performance Metrics

• Calls per day

• Contacts per day

• Leads qualified

• Appointments set

• Follow-up completion rate

• Conversion rate to contracts



Compensation

Base pay (hourly or salary depending on experience) plus performance bonuses based on

appointments set, deals closed, and lead quality.



Schedule

Wednesday - Saturday

10am - 12pm & 3pm - 5pm Central Standard Time



Why Join KVR Legacy LLC?

• Clear systems and structured call flows.

• Performance-based bonuses.

• Growth opportunities within the company.

• Long-term opportunity for top performers.



If you are confident on the phone, organized, and ready to help distressed

homeowners while building a long-term career in real estate investing — apply

today.

-

Our Values

mbers say this is more than just a workplace — it’s a supportive community where you can grow your career and feel valued. Here’s what you can look forward to:

title: Tech Support Specialist
description:
Technical Support Specialist (Part-Time, U.S. Hours)

 Hours: 20 hours/week, available 8:00 AM – 4:00 PM Pacific Time (California)

 Rate: $10–$13/hour USD (based on experience), paid electronically

 Type: Independent contractor, long-term engagement

 Start: Immediate



 About Us

 We are a small AI software company that helps law firms automatically capture and create billing time entries. Our customers are attorneys and legal staff who use our product daily. We're growing and need a dedicated support person to help our customers get the most out of our software.



 What You'll Be Doing



 Customer Support (Primary)

 * Monitor and respond to incoming support
s and chat messages during business hours

 * Troubleshoot customer issues — most are configuration, setup, or "how do I do this?" questions

 * Conduct video calls with screen sharing to walk customers through solutions

 * Log every support interaction into our ticketing system with clear notes on the issue, steps taken, and resolution

 * Escalate complex or technical issues to our development team with well-documented details

 * Follow up with customers to confirm issues are resolved



 Onboarding Assistance

 * Help new law firm customers get set up and configured

 * Walk users through initial setup via
, chat, or video call

 * Create and update simple how-to guides or FAQs based on recurring questions



 Quality & Improvement

 * Track common issues and suggest improvements to documentation or product

 * Flag patterns — if multiple customers hit the same problem, let us know

 * Help us build out our knowledge base over time



 Who We're Looking For



 Must-haves:

 * Completely fluent English — spoken and written. You'll be on video calls with U.S. attorneys and their staff. Your English must be polished and professional in both writing and live conversation.

 * Available 8:00 AM – 4:00 PM Pacific Time. This is not full-time active work — you need to be responsive and on-call during this window to handle support requests as they come in. Some days will be busy, others quiet. We understand this is late evening / overnight in the Philippines — this must genuinely work for your schedule long-term.

 * Patient and empathetic. Our customers are busy professionals who are not always tech-savvy. You need to explain things clearly without talking down to anyone.

 * Strong written communication. Most support is via
 and chat. Your messages need to be clear, professional, and helpful — not robotic or overly scripted. We require you use a good LLM like Claude 4.6 to draft responses.  We will pay the $20/month for Claude.

 * Comfortable on video calls. You'll occasionally share screens and walk customers through steps live. A professional appearance, clear audio, and good camera setup are expected.

 * Reliable internet and quiet workspace — non-negotiable for calls and consistent availability.

 * Willing to work with AI / LLMs — we use AI tools internally and expect you to as well.



 Strong pluses:

 * Prior experience in SaaS or software technical support

 * Experience supporting U.S.-based customers

 * Familiarity with ticketing systems (Zendesk, Freshdesk, Intercom, HubSpot, or similar)

 * Familiarity with the legal industry or legal software (Clio and MyCase)

 * Quick learner — comfortable picking up new software without extensive hand-holding

 * Experience creating help documentation or knowledge base articles



 What We Provide

 * Full training on our product — you don't need to know it coming in, but you need to learn it quickly

 * Training on our support ticketing system and processes

 * Direct access to our development team for escalations

 * A supportive, small-team environment where your input matters



 Compensation

 * Base rate: $10–$13/hour USD, depending on experience

 * Annual review: We revisit the rate annually as the company grows

 * Stability: We're looking for a long-term tea
mber, not a short-term contractor

 * Growth potential: As we grow, this role can expand in scope and compensation



 How to Apply

 Please send:

 1. A short introduction about yourself and why this role interests you

 2. Your experience with technical support, customer service, or SaaS products

 3. Your English proficiency level and any certifications (IELTS, TOEFL, etc.), if available

 4. Confirm that you can be consistently available 8:00 AM – 4:00 PM Pacific Time

 5. Your expected hourly rate

 6. A brief sample: Write 3–4 sentences as if you were responding to this customer
: "Hi, I just signed up for your software, but I can't figure out how to connect it to my Clio account. Can someone help?"  (Use Claude to draft the response).



We respond to every qualified application within 1 business day.

Contributors from any country are welcome to participate. You must already have or be willing to purchase an iPhone 11 or newer and a head-mount for it.



Recording should be done with a head mount—?neck and chest mounts are not acceptable.

Each video you upload must be of a specific task, and NOT a mix of tasks. For example, one video upload should not have you doing both cooking and laundry. Instead, you should record separate videos of cooking and then doing the laundry, and upload both separately.

Ideally, you should record a mix of tasks between 15-30 minutes long.

The space where you record your video should have excellent lighting.

Keep the camera steady with minimal shaking.

All submitted footage must exclude any other individuals' faces unless they directly consent. Additionally, no third party music is permitted in the footage to avoid copyright violations.

No children should appear in the submitted footage.

Minimize external noise during the recording–especially talking–so the audio of the task can be captured clearly and keep the camera as steady as possible throughout the recording.

Complete each task from start to finish without walking away or leaving to do another task or take a break.

Tasks should be performed while either standing up, sitting on a chair/stool, not while sitting on the ground.

Perform all activities in a controlled, slow manner.

title: Real Estate Photo Editor/Quality Control
description:
We are seeking an individual who thrives in a collaborative team environment, demonstrates enthusiasm, and takes initiative. Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to provide effective solutions are essential. The ideal candidate should be organized and capable of enhancing our existing systems.



Responsibilities:

Primary responsibility involves meticulously reviewing each image received from our editing house, ensuring consistency and adherence to our brand standards. This entails identifying mistakes or inconsistencies in the editing process to maintain a unified visual style.



If content falls short of our brand standards, the candidate will be required to either send it back with revision requests or make necessary adjustments, including exposure, color correction, cropping, and other enhancements, to ensure a professional and appealing look.



Proficiency in photo editing software such as Adobe Photoshop and Lightroom is a must. A solid understanding of various editing techniques and tools available in these programs is expected.



Effective communication and collaboration with photographers and the scheduling team are crucial. The candidate will closely work with them to comprehend clients' specific requirements, ensuring that the final images align with their vision.



Management and prioritization of a substantial volume of images within tight deadlines is a key responsibility. The candidate should employ efficient workflows and demonstrate strong time management skills to complete editing tasks punctually.



A keen eye for detail is indispensable in identifying and rectifying imperfections or inconsistencies in the images.



Maintenance of an organized file structure and the use of proper naming conventions for edited images are critical. This facilitates easy access, retrieval, and sharing of files with both clients and tea
mbers.



Reach out to clients in a timely manner and effectively response to clients' revision requests is vital for ensuring customer satisfaction.



Required Experience:

Virtual Staging

Proficient in Photoshop and Lightroom

Exposure blending

Luminosity masks

Layer masking

Color correction and grading

Sky replacement

Virtual dusk

--

Tuesday - Saturday 6am-2pm EST

Dont forget to send link of your CVs and  your portfolio. Other candidate forgets that. So dont miss it! :)



In your message  write "I bring magic" in the first sentence of your application letter. This will be our identifier that you have completely read our job post up to the end because we are seeking for the someone who is very keen to details.

title: Now Hiring: Real Estate ISA – Remote Role with Great Pay + Bonuses
description:
Are you a real estate-savvy professional with a passion for people and results? We are seeking an experienced and proactive Inside Sales Agent (ISA) who speaks the language of real estate and thrives in a fast-paced, team-oriented environment. This is a virtual position supporting a high-performing real estate team.



WHAT YOU'LL DO:

As our ISA, you’ll play a critical role in converting inbound and outbound leads into scheduled appointments for our agents. You’ll be the first point of contact for many of our clients and prospects, so professionalism, energy, and follow-up are key!



Primary Responsibilities:

Respond to inbound leads via phone,
, and text with professionalism and care

Place outbound prospecting and follow-up calls to potential buyers and sellers

Manage and update leads in the CRM and ensure they are on the appropriate drip campaigns

Set up property listing alerts for buyer leads

Schedule appointments and coordinate agent calendars using shared Outlook tools

Qualify leads and match them with the right agents based on their needs

Perform general admin duties including website updates, filing, and communication support

Handle rotating weekend lead coverage as part of the team schedule



WHO YOU ARE:

Experienced in real estate (required)

Tech-savvy, especially with CRMs (CINC experience is a major plus)

Skilled in Google Docs, Sheets, and Microsoft Outlook

A strong communicator with excellent written and verbal English skills

Comfortable and professional on the phone

Organized, detail-oriented, and reliable

Able to work independently with minimal supervision

Have a fast, stable internet connection (at least 200 Mbps) and a distraction-free home office setup



WHY JOIN US?

Competitive salary based on experience

Bonus eligibility after 90 days

Paid holidays (Christmas & Thanksgiving)

Medical insurance reimbursement (Maxicare Platinum) after 90 days

Prorated 13th-month pay after 90 days

A supportive, experienced real estate team that values your contributions and success



Ready to Apply?

If you’re excited about this opportunity and ready to be a key player on a growing team, we’d love to hear from you! 

Please reply with your updated resume and
 ID for easier communication.

title: Business Development Rep
description:
****** MUST SUBMIT A RESUME & VOICE RECORDING IN ORDER TO BE CONSIDERED ******



We are a provider of advanced network communications and technology solutions for consumers, small businesses, enterprise organizations, and carrier partners across the U.S.



About the Role:

The Major Account Development Manager will focus on business development, by selling our full suite of strategic products and services to an assigned geographic base of customers. Our goal is to increase wallet share, increase customer satisfaction with us, reduce churn, and increase our customer base utilization of strategic next-gen services. The Major Account Development Manager will leverage a full support team consisting of an Sales Director and Project Management team



What You’ll Do:



Develop and maintain a comprehensive understanding of our sales process, products, and solutions to ensure customers are under contract with the most strategic product set.

Develop a deep understanding of a customer’s business, corporate priorities, and industry to effectively identify solutions that align with the customer’s strategy and needs.

Develop, own, and document the multi-faceted account plan and growth strategy for each customer;

manage priorities and eco-system partners to meet established milestones and achieve sales growth objectives. A

ct with a sense of urgency and work in close partnership with the Customer Success organization, to assure customer issues are resolved quickly.

Develop and implement plans to create additional opportunities to cross-sell and up-sell accounts and increase overall total customer spend.

Manage a pipeline of opportunities in Upgrade to see actual info including generation of accurate forecasts and attainment of assigned quotas.

Participate in, and successfully complete, all required training; participate in teaUpgrade to see actual infoetings and activities as required



Do You Have?

Verifiable record of success in enterprise-level sales, owning a customer base, and driving full life-cycle management of sales, conversions, and renewals.

Prior strategic account management and consultative sales experience selling multiple products and solutions to medium and large businesses.

Strong interpersonal skills, organization skills, time management skills, listening skills, presentation skills, verbal, and written communication skills.

Ability to confidently network, build rapport, and develop trusted relationships overtime to execute mid to long-term account plans.

Excellent presentation skills and ability to speak with business professionals at all levels in an organization and across multiple lines of business.

Strong PC skills, including expertise in MS Office.

Experience in building account plans and leading customer business reviews (MBRs and QBRs).

Experience driving strategic consulting services into new accounts while consistently achieving or exceeding sales goals by generating and maintaining a qualified pipeline.

Even Better:

Strong business, financial and technical acumen with negotiation and closing proficiency.

Strong problem-solving and analytical skills

title: VoIP Technician ****Ex Ring Central Employees Welcome X** EX 8X8 Employees Welcome*******
description:
****YOU MUST SUBMIT A RESUME AND VOICE RECORDING IN ORDER TO BE CONSIDERED FOR A POSITION****





We are a leading telecommunications solutions provider dedicated to delivering cutting-edge communication technologies to businesses of all sizes. We pride ourselves on providing exceptional service and innovative solutions to our clients, and we are looking for a talented Telecommunications Phone System Technician to join our team.



Position Overview:

As a Telecommunications Phone System Technician, you will play a crucial role in designing, implementing, and maintaining telecommunications systems for our clients. We are seeking an experienced technician with a strong background in legacy systems like Nortel, Avaya, and NEC, as well as expertise in modern UCaaS (Unified Communications as a Service) solutions and VoIP phone systems such as RingCentral, 8x8, 3CX, and Nextiva.



Responsibilities:



Install, configure, and maintain legacy phone systems like Nortel, Avaya, and NEC EC.

Design and implement UCaaS solutions to meet client requirements.

Configure and troubleshoot VoIP phone systems, including RingCentral, 8x8, 3CX, and Nextiva.

Perform system upgrades, patches, and maintenance tasks.

Provide technical support and assistance to clients, both remotely and on-site.

Collaborate with clients to understand their telecommunication needs and recommend solutions.

Assist in the training of end-users on telecommunication systems.

Keep up-to-date with industry trends and emerging technologies in telecommunications.

Qualifications:



Minimum of 3 years of hands-on experience in telecommunications.

Proficiency in legacy phone systems such as Nortel, Avaya, and NEC EC.

Strong knowledge of UCaaS solutions and VoIP phone systems, including RingCentral, 8x8, 3CX, and Nextiva.

Excellent troubleshooting and problem-solving skills.

Strong communication and interpersonal skills.

Ability to work independently and as part of a team.

Previous experience with 8x8, RingCentral, Nextiva, or Dialpad is a strong plus.

Industry certifications (e.g., CCNA, CCNP, UCaaS certifications) are a bonus.



Why Join?



Competitive salary and benefits package.

Opportunities for professional growth and development.

Collaborative and supportive team environment.

Exposure to cutting-edge telecommunications technologies.

Chance to work with a diverse range of clients and industries.

Employee recognition and appreciation programs.

If you are a dedicated Telecommunications Phone System Technician with experince in legacy systems and modern UCaaS/VoIP solutions, we encourage you to apply. Join our team and help us shape the future of business communication.

title: Setup Specialist (Fresh Graduates or with Experienced, Permanent WFH)
description:
Setup Specialist (Initial Disclosure Specialist)



Applicants must hold a Bachelor's degree in Finance, Economics, Business, Accounting, or a related field ONLY. Applicants without this degree requirement will not be considered.

We are looking for a highly detail-oriented Setup Specialist to join our mortgage operations team. Your main responsibility is to prepare and review initial mortgage disclosures to ensure accuracy, compliance, and timely delivery to borrowers. This is a great opportunity for someone who wants long-term stability, growth, and a work-from-home setup.



Job Responsibilities



Prepare and review initial mortgage disclosures with strict attention to accuracy and compliance.

Ensure disclosures are delivered on time and in accordance with federal and state regulations.

Coordinate with loan officers, processors, and internal teams to collect required information.

Stay updated on mortgage regulations and compliance requirements.

Identify, investigate, and resolve any discrepancies in disclosure documents.

Help improve internal policies, checklists, and workflows for the disclosure process.

Maintain well-organized and accurate documentation of disclosure activities.



Qualifications



Bachelor’s degree in Finance, Economics, Business, Accounting, or related field (required).

Excellent attention to detail with strong organizational skills.

Strong written and verbal communication skills.

Ability to work independently and collaborate in a fast-paced environment.

Proficient in Microsoft Office and comfortable learning new software.

Experience in US mortgage industry is a plus but not required.



Benefits



Competitive salary + performance incentives

Paid time off and holidays (after regularization)

Work-from-home setup

Long-term position with opportunities for promotion

Paid training and periodic salary reviews



Work Schedule



Full-time (40 hours/week)

Night shift / Rotational shift

Monday to Friday

May require occasional weekends or holidays depending on workload



How to Apply (IMPORTANT – READ CAREFULLY)

To be considered, you must follow these instructions:



1. Send us a message with the subject line:

STAR + Your Full Name

2. Include the link to your resume in the message.



Applications without the correct subject line or without a resume link will be automatically rejected.
